title: October 2023 social media posts
html_content:
This page is an archive of Chris's social media posts during October 2023. Unless otherwise indicated, the posts are on Twitter under the username CPU_CWCSonichu.

Contents

  • 1 Second Coming
  • 2 Setting the Record straight
  • 3 Roman Colosseum
  • 4 Chris is still mad about MLP G5
  • 5 Elon Musk
  • 6 Chris's thoughts on Israel and Ukraine
  • 7 Christmas Play
  • 8 Favorite Mane 6
  • 9 Etsy Store update
  • 10 Christmas Play Part 2
  • 11 She speaks truth
  • 12 Minecraft server
  • 13 Christmas Play Part 3
  • 14 Christmas Play Part 4
  • 15 Stream announcement
  • 16 Going Live
  • 17 Christmas Play Part 5
  • 18 Chocolate and fruits
  • 19 Scott Pilgrim Takes Off
  • 20 Scott Pilgrim Takes Off music
  • 21 Livestream announcement
  • 22 GiBi
  • 23 OfficialCWCmart

Second Coming

16 October
4:51 PM

Second Coming with Ultimate Miracle. üåàüíé. Chaos Control!

Setting the Record straight

17 October
4:04 PM

Setting the Record straight - there never was any sex involving me in 2021 youtu.be/yDR6e83zrWg?si=X8FndUXHL1X9L4bS via @YouTube

Roman Colosseum

18 October
11:19 AM

[Quote replying to Chris's previous Twitter post.]

GhostRade
Wait why did you green screen yourself into the Roman colosseum

[Posts screenshot of the thumbnail.]

Chris
It‚Äôs the Royal Albert Hall, for obvious reasons.

Chris is still mad about MLP G5

18 October

Equestria Daily
The G5 comic Black, White, & Blue has officially released today! I love how many side series we are getting for the comics lately.

Go check it out: equestriadaily.com/2023/10/my-little-pony-black-white-blue.html

Chris¬†12:56 PM
NOBODY Cares for MLP G5; Resume Friendship is Magic Already, @Hasbro, Please! I Literally Foreknew and Foretold how Premature and Awful G5 was to be. #PsychicPowers #Avatar #JesusChristIsRightHere
Chris¬†12:59 PM
Still have not watched ANY of MLPG5 At All, and I Never Shall until AFTER My Little Pony - Friendship is Magic, Season 14 Episode 26 is aired on tv, streaming services and all, @Hasbro
Chris¬†1:03 PM
Here, @Hasbro, I‚Äôll make this EASY for you, so Heed My Input and do it: hire everyone of G4 cast and crew back, and with John DeLancy as Discord, start with Discord telling everyone G5 is undone and resume G4 from there. Definitely get Faust back on as well. Nightstar and I are more than happy to help, personally. üåàüíé

Elon Musk

18 October

Chris¬†1:07 PM
And on an unrelated note, Verification Process improvement aside, but the price is not needed for that, @elonmusk really has fucked Twitter up. Nobody, not even I, will ever refer to it as ‚ÄúX‚Äù; that is just as Stupid Y Stupid (tonto y tonto) as Team Rocket and Giovanni, period.
Chris¬†1:08 PM
Phew! It feels really good to finally get that off of my mind and back.

Chris's thoughts on Israel and Ukraine

18 October

Carrie Krueger
@CPU_CWCSonichu What‚Äôs your input on what‚Äôs going on in Israel?
Chris¬†1:12 PM
Demons and Devils are literally at work on both sides there.
Chris¬†1:18 PM
Also, Putin shall die by his own sword, I heavily support and supported Ukraine üá∫üá¶ in defenses amidst my work. And the Ukraine girl sitting by POTUS Lisa Simpson in the circle meditation drawing, in a Church in Israel with that church‚Äôs Israeli priest there leading the circle, was an escapee from that WWIII that Lisa adopted.
Chris¬†1:19 PM
Also, Putin shall die by his own sword, I heavily support and supported Ukraine üá∫üá¶ in defenses amidst my work. And the Ukraine girl sitting by POTUS Lisa Simpson in the circle meditation drawing, in a Church in Israel with that church‚Äôs Israeli priest there leading the circle, was an escapee from that WWIII that Lisa adopted.
Chris¬†1:21 PM
Also, Putin shall die by his own sword, I heavily support and supported Ukraine üá∫üá¶ in defenses amidst my work. And the Ukraine girl sitting by POTUS Lisa Simpson in the circle meditation drawing, in a Church in Israel with that church‚Äôs Israeli priest there leading the circle, was an escapee from that WWIII that Lisa adopted.

For unknown reasons, Chris reposted the above reply 2 more times.

Christmas Play

18 October
11:44 PM

Part One of the reading of Angelica Rosechu's 2005 Christmas Play is up.

[links to video]

Favorite Mane 6

20 October
11:03 PM

In response to a tweet asking people which one of the main 6 characters from My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic is their favorite.

Rainbow Dash and Applejack are tied as my top faves. Yet I also identify with Princess Twilight Sparkle.

Etsy Store update

22 October
5:47 PM

Hey, everyone. I am very well aware of the orders that have been coming in on my Etsy store. The Medallion stock is low, but we are personally restocking with personal crafting, painting and certification. Please, remain patient as we restock and complete the orders. The wait will be worth it. Thank you all for the continued support and kindness.

Christmas Play Part 2

23 October
8:40 PM

Angelica's Christmas Play Part 2

[links to video]

She speaks truth

24 October
10:43 AM

She speaks truth; meditate on it for yourselves. ‚ö°Ô∏èüíô‚ö°Ô∏è

[Links to a YouTube video titled Find Your Purpose By Doing THIS]

Transcript of the video

Teal Swan: Purpose is not something you can find. It is something that falls in your lap as a result of following your emotions in the direction of what feels good, and that is a moment to moment choice. If you can't find your purpose, it's because you're not doing that moment to moment. You're falling into a common trap, which is that you're looking for purpose to make you feel happy, instead of looking for happiness in the moment. So, right here in this minute, what would make you feel better?

Minecraft server

24 October
11:11 AM

We are also looking for @Minecraft players to help in building a Hub area in my server from an island I started; skilled volunteers apply, please. Send inquiries to cwcvilleguardian@gmail.com if interested. Thank you very much.

Stay Tuned

9:52 PM

Chocolate and fruits

28 October
10:28 AM

Friendly reminder: get in your daily good dose of vitamin filled fruit.

üçéüçäüçåüçìüçí

Apple a day keeps the doctor away. Oranges have Vitamin C for Defenses. Banana, Strawberries and Cherries are also good.

Scott Pilgrim Takes Off

28 October
10:48 AM

Also, are y‚Äôall looking forward to #ScottPilgrimTakesOff? The anime opening song is really good. üéµüé∂

[Chris links to Scott Pilgrim Takes Off || Leaked Intro ]

Scott Pilgrim Takes Off music

29 October
10:52 AM

[Chris quotes his tweet from the previous day.]

The song is and Feels Really Good. Hey @Apple, let‚Äôs get Bloom from Talkie onto @AppleMusic, please. This song is *Awesomely Fuzzyspirational/Vibrational*; perfect for my Playlist.

#ScottPilgrimTakesOff

Livestream announcement

30 October
10:10 AM

Hey, everyone. Just a heads-up, I‚Äôll be doing a live stream at about 6:00 pm: Story Time. Come online to enjoy it. Something from recent drawings that y‚Äôall have seen before.

GiBi

30 October
3:24 PM

GiBi_Devon
can someone please give me an alternative theory as to who that is in this picture so I can sleep at night, because my initial assumption is no good. k thx

Chris
No, GiBi, that is, indeed you; no alternative theory. You have gone back in time to February, 2006, as did Lightning Bliss and a number of others.

OfficialCWCmart

30 October
7:25 PM

I forgot to mention: the Etsy store is restocked.

[Chris links to OfficialCWCmart]
